feature.label: Eugenia
feature.description: EuGENia is a tool that automatically generates the .gmfgraph, .gmftool and .gmfmap models needed to implement a GMF editor from a single annotated Ecore metamodel. It can also integrate optional polishing transformations written in EOL that automate the customization of these models. EuGENia can be run from the Eclipse UI or from the Apache Ant task provided by this feature.
